# NSImage.SymbolScale.large

**Case**

The symbol uses the large scale variant.

## Declaration

```swift
case large
```

## Discussion

This scale is approximately 30% larger than the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImage/SymbolScale/medium] scale.

## Constants

- **NSImage.SymbolScale.small**: The symbol uses the small scale variant.
- **NSImage.SymbolScale.medium**: The symbol uses the default medium scale variant.
